text: Tom Thibodeau (born January 17, 1958 in New Britain, Connecticut) is an American basketball coach. He was the head coach of the Chicago Bulls. He was the assistant coach for many teams in the National Basketball Association including the Philadelphia 76ers, for the New York Knicks, and for the Boston Celtics. He won NBA Coach of the Year in 2011Tom Thibodeau â€“ Associate Head Coach, Celtics.comand in 2012 he won the NBA All-Star Game head coach. In 2012, he became the fastest coach in NBA history to earn 100 victories and finished as the runner-up for Coach of the Year. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Chicago Bulls head coaches Category:Sportspeople from Connecticut
title: Tom Thibodeau
